main.name: Ted Peters
main.bio: Full Stack Developer with demonstrated experience across the Software Development Lifecycle focused in Javascript. I love the feeling of overcoming difficult challeneges. Whenever I need a breathe of fresh air or to get out of my head I like to go hiking, skateboarding, painting, or if I can cook a nice meal for friends and family I would definitely choose that over all else.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in contacting me for anything, please email me directly. If you prefer to talk by phone just include your info in your message so I can get back to you as soon as possible.

projects.title: AdvenSure
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Personal assistant for creating a packing list for travel. Uses UI framework React, Node.js for a runtime enviroment, MongoDB for a cross platfrom document oriented database, and an express server.
